author: Gail Monaghan
title: How To Make Gnocchi in 4 Simple Steps
text:
THESE GNOCCHI aren’t the high-maintenance kind. Do not confuse them with potato gnocchi, the perfect little pillows you order in restaurants because they’re too much trouble to make at home.
Last summer, at a simple garden lunch outside Rome, I discovered another, homier recipe. A plate of semolina gnocchi—aka gnocchi alla romana—redefined this food for me.
